name: Anantherum

Head: Boils and tumors on tip of nose
Pains pierce brain like pointed arrows; worse in afternoon
Wart like growth on eyebrows
Tongue fissured, as if cut on edges; copious salivation
Herpes, ulcers, and tumors on scalp

details: Painful swelling of various parts, going on to suppuration. Glandular inflammation.A skin remedy of high order.
